name: By the Pool
description: So this guy, McLaughlin, tried to access a hacking forum called Bread, and then he uploaded a very inflammatory file onto your cousin's computer. You have his login credentials, so why don't you put them to good use and see if this forum visit was somehow related to what happened to your cousin? You might have to use an appropriate DNS server, though.

tasks.name: Tool?
tasks.description: What file type did the hacker disguise the tool as?

tasks.name: Home Sweet Home
tasks.description: Where was the transaction confirmation image sent from? We are interested in comma-separated coordinates, rounded to 3 digits after the decimal point.
